item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 09 Mar 2021
item.description:
1. Working on an app to learn and execute OCaml on iPhone/iPad/Mac for beginners
  2. ERic (Entity-Relation interactive calculator) version 0.3
  3. OCaml Caf√©: Tue, March 9 @ 7-9pm (CST)
  4. Functional Programming User Study (Specifically in OCaml)
  5. OCaml 4.12.0 released (with 4.11.2 too)
  6. Other OCaml News
